functionDecorators.name: lockTokens
functionDecorators.description: Lock ERC20 tokens for deposit, callable only by manager.

parameterDecorators.description: Address who wants to deposit tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: depositReceiver
parameterDecorators.description: Address (address) who wants to receive tokens on child chain.
